rows.label: qev027006MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh. Welcome back, yes?
And, um...nice work, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0002
rows.name: I hear you took care of our shooter? ...Yay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0003
rows.name: *sigh* But there's just...one little problem, isn't there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0004
rows.name: A certain someone is demanding hazard pay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0005
rows.name:
And by "a certain someone," I mean the greedy grump
standing behind me, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0006
rows.name: Grrr! Very very grrrr![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0007
rows.name:
Seems she's less impressed with our whole "why don't
you get shot?" plan now that she's had time to think
through it, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0008
rows.name:
She said something about it being...an atrocity?
Or a crime against nature? Something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0009
rows.name:
Anyway, now she's asking for a lifetime supply of
pizza money as as as ransom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0010
rows.name: And that's a lot, yes? A LOT lot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0011
rows.name:
As I recall, this was your plan in the first place, no?
So you should be the one to take responsibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0012
rows.name:
But start saving up, because a Ma-non can easily put
away 500,000 credits worth of pizza in a lifetime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev027006_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you'll go earn the pizza money.

rows.label: qev027006_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev027006_SEL0021
rows.name: Propose an alternate plan.

rows.label: qev027006MSG0013
rows.name: I'm glad you're so quick to understand, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0014
rows.name:
I mean, you ARE just reaping what you've sown,
so I suppose it's only natural, isn't it? But still!
Good for for for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0015
rows.name:
It's that kind of customer service that keeps a business
going, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0016
rows.name: What, not eager to settle this with cash?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0017
rows.name:
...You want to offer up a heartfelt apology instead?
...That's the human way to handle this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0018
rows.name: Yeah, but no. No no no no way. Nope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0019
rows.name: That's not how it works with Ma-non, is it? No.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0020
rows.name:
We prefer a heartfelt a-payoff-y. Cash is the universal
lubricant, as they say. Yes? They say that? ...No?
Anyway, you get the idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0021
rows.name:
I don't want to sound TOO money-obsessed here,
mind you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0022
rows.name:
But leaving a nice, clear entry in the old ledger is a
great way to avoid problems in the future, right?
Then everyone knows where they stand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0023
rows.name:
What I'm saying is, it's probably best if you just give
up and bring the woman her pizza money, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0024
rows.name:
Drop by once you've scrounged up 500,000 credits,
won't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0025
rows.name:
Don't worry about writing a nice note or anything,
okay? No need to get fancy. Just drop a pile of cash
in her lap and Heradot will be so so so happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0026
rows.name: Right, Heradot?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0027
rows.name: Grrrr. Yes, that sounds lovely, GRRRR![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0028
rows.name:
See? There you have it! Now, good luck earning those
500,000 credits, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0029
rows.name:
I'll settle for no less than half a million! I want exactly
500,000 credits on the nose, all right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027006MSG0030
rows.name:
So go find that money, then come fork it over, okay?
Thank yo... I mean, GRRRRR![ST:wait ]
